com.compendium.io.jabber
Interface BSConfListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MeetingReplay
public interface BSConfListener

BSConfListener is interface you can implement to get conference events notifications.

Author:
Jiri Komzak, Knowledge Media Institute, Open University, United Kingdom
